articles.title: End of good times for IT firms as global headwinds force hiring freeze, spending cuts - Economic Times
articles.description: Impact of global headwinds is clearly visible — economic slowdown, high inflation, demand pressures, postponement in new technology spending are all gnawing at the IT sector at once. And these are more than enough to offset gains from the depreciating rupee.
